content:
Hello,
Are there plans for the eCR Now application to submit an eICR using a FHIR Push instead of a SOAP Push (XDR) or Direct Messaging? Maybe this is not supported because AIMS cannot support receiving a FHIR push?
Thanks,
Mike
FHIR Push is not supported in eCR Now app because the existing infrastructure only accepts CDA payload via Direct and/or XDR.
@John Moehrke Not sure. It might be best to ask @John Loonsk tomorrow on the Connectathon
let me know if I can help. MHD is designed as a FHIR based API to the various document sharing exchanges. It is much lower tech than XDR, but fully can be an API to XDR.

like XDR and Direct... it is content agnostic... can carry a formal document like CDA, or can carry a much less formal document like a FHIR Resource or FHIR Resource Bundle (e.g. one Immunization Resource)... etc. With the metadata design from the 20 years of experience in document sharing to support the needs of cross-enterprise, or cross-community communications.

@Nagesh Bashyam so I configured my client details, but got some errors, so I want to reconfigure... now every time I try to save, I get this in my log (and nothing usable in the web UI):

Grahame - The edit feature is still under development, the easiest way is to drop the table and the app will recreate the table and you can reenter the information, Or you could alternatively just delete the row. Hopefully you will choose one appraoach. The Edit feature will be available next week.
so I have no idea what I'm doing with pgAdmin but I can't find a table to drop
image.png Screen Shot 2020-05-13 at 3.53.39 PM
now: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: relation "client_details" does not exist

@Grahame Grieve
Let us delete the following 2 tables (launch_details and client_details) , if it is does not work then..we can do a skype session
